text: You cannot introduce new protected methods in a class in javax.el package.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com

text:
Mark, the method invoke in the current tree is very complex, so splitting it up into several methods might be desirable.

Konstantin, would making the new methods private work?

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
The patch just moves stuff around. If improving understanding is your goal then comments would be more useful.

Any additional methods would have to be private
